title: Difference between javascript and nodejs
blogdetails: Javasctipt: Javascript is a programming Language that is used for writting script on the website Node: Node JS is a runtime environment. Javascript: Javasctript is just run in the browser. Node: Node use server side. Javascript: Javascript can perform Node: V8 is the Javascript engine inside of node. JS: Javascript is used in frontend development. Node: Nodejs is written in C, C++ and Javascript
